headline.main: Finnish Action Discounted; Possible Armistice Viewed as of Little Avail to Russia in North

lead_paragraph: To THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: There were no doubt strong reasons for the formal appeal made to the Finnish Government from Washington, but there is no reason to put forward the illusion that an armistice with Finland could substantially alter the Russian military situation on the northern front.
abstract: lr on U S demand on Finland
